description: Montagu Evans LLP Head office, situated on floors 11 & 12 within 70 St Mary Axe - nicknamed the Can Of Ham. Montagu Evans offices house up to 220 colleagues onsite who work within the property management business.
facilities: Photography is not permitted on site

factsheet.heading: Montagu Evans new offices based at 70 St Mary Axe in December 2020
paragraphs: Our offices house up to 220 Montagu Evans colleagues over two floors within 70 St Mary Axe based on floors 11 & 12 comprising of over 26,000 sq ft of office and agile working space.
This is the new London Head Office for Montagu Evans.

location.address: Montagu Evans, 11th & 12th Floors, 70 St Mary Axe, EC3A 8BE
travel_info: Nearest tube: Bank, Tower Hill, Liverpool Street

name: Montagu Evans 11th and 12th Floors
